It returns around 7.5-liter/100km.The BR-V is a relaxed cruiser over long distance trips on the highways. The cabin of the BR-V is practical and apart from the generous amounts of space you also get several storage bins and bottle holders. The first and the second rows seats are very comfortable with plenty of headroom and legroom to spare.
